17200.name: National Representative Warrior's Earring
17200.description: National Representative Warrior's Earring. It has effects of MP +31, shock/mind attack resistance +20%, Shock/Mental attack rate +20% and Vampiric Rage. Only one effect is applied even when the two identical earrings are worn. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17201.name: Proof of Cheers
17201.description: National Representative Warrior's tenacity. Mark needed to use the Spell of Blessing and Energy of Victory skill. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17202.name: Proof of Cheers 10 Pack
17202.description: Wrapped pack containing 10 proofs of cheers. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17203.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Ball Trapping Gnosian
17203.description: Bracelet that summons a ball trapping Gnosian. It wears a red uniform. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Release Seal on Agathion - Ball Trapping Gnosian

17204.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Ball Trapping Orodriel
17204.description: Bracelet that summons a ball trapping Orodriel. It wears a red uniform. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Release Seal on Agathion - Ball Trapping Orodriel

17205.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Penalty Kick
17205.description: Bracelet that summons a Gnosian and Orodriel who are practicing penalty kicks. All are wearing red uniforms. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Release Seal on Agathion - Penalty Kick

17206.name: Nevit's Hourglass - 1 hour
17206.description: Hourglass that increases Nevit's blessing time by 1 hour. Can be used regardless of level. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17207.name: Nevit's Hourglass - 1.5 hour
17207.description: Hourglass that increases Nevit's blessing time by 1.5 hour. Can be used regardless of level. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17208.name: Nevit's Hourglass - 2 hour
17208.description: Hourglass that increases Nevit's blessing time by 2 hour. Can be used regardless of level. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17209.name: Nevit's Hourglass - 2.5 hour
17209.description: Hourglass that increases Nevit's blessing time by 2.5 hour. Can be used regardless of level. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17210.name: Nevit's Hourglass - 3 hour
17210.description: Hourglass that increases Nevit's blessing time by 3 hour. Can be used regardless of level. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17211.name: Nevit's Hourglass - 4 hour
17211.description: Hourglass that increases Nevit's blessing time by 4 hour. Can be used regardless of level. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17212.name: Nevit's Voice
17212.description: Seashell containing Nevit's voice. Item that raises your evaluation value by 10. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17213.name: Solina's Biography
17213.description: A biography containing the life story of Solina, a saintess of the Elmore-Aden kingdom. This text has been banned throughout the kingdom and is incredibly difficult to find and intact copy. Double click for more information.

17214.name: Kaerun's Memoir
17214.description: A complete copy of Kaerun's Memoir. It is a detailed look at Solina's life written by Kaerun from his perspective. This book was never circulated but it's original print has been archived inside the monastery. Double click for more information.

17215.name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 1
17215.description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

17216.name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 2
17216.description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

17217.name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 3
17217.description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

17218.name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 4
17218.description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

17219.name: Eris's Chronicle
17219.description: A book chronicling the early life and events of Solina written by Eris, the abbot of the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

17220.name: Catalog Card
17220.description: Librarian Sophia has given the catalog card containing the location of the book. Double click for more information.

17221.name: Key to the Passageway
17221.description: Key that opens the passageway gate to the Seal of the Saintess entrance. You can enter the passageway with this key.

17222.name: Key to the Tomb
17222.description: Key that opens the door to the Tomb inside the Relic Safehouse of the Seal of the Saintess. You cannot enter the Tomb without this key.

17223.name: Key to the Library
17223.description: Key that opens the door to the Library inside the Relic Safehouse of the Seal of the Saintess. You cannot enter the Library without this key.

17224.name: Key to the Warehouse
17224.description: Key that opens the door to the Warehouse inside the Relic Safehouse of the Seal of the Saintess. You cannot enter the Warehouse without this key.

17225.name: Key to the Armory
17225.description: Key that opens the door to the Armory inside the Relic Safehouse of the Seal of the Saintess. You cannot enter the Armory without this key.

17226.name: Elcadia's Mark
17226.description: Rune mark created by magic for Elcadia's test.

17227.name: Elcadia's Token
17227.description: Rune token created by magic for Elcadia's test.

17228.name: Scroll of Abstinence
17228.description: One of the relics stored inside the Seal of the Saintess. This scroll emanates an unusual energy. The scroll is very old and worn. It must be handled with care.

17229.name: Shield of Sacrifice
17229.description: One of the relics stored inside the Seal of the Saintess. This shield emanates an unusual energy. But it is very worn and large. It is fragile and cannot be used in battle.

17230.name: Sword of Holy Spirit
17230.description: One of the relics stored inside the Seal of the Saintess. The sword emanates an unusual energy. But it is very worn and large. It is fragile and cannot be used in battle.

17231.name: Staff of Blessing
17231.description: One of the relics stored inside the Seal of the Saintess. This staff emanates an unusual energy. But it is very worn and heavy. It is fragile cannot be used in battle.

17232.name: Ball Trapping Gnosian Agathion Pack
17232.description: Wrapped pack containing a Ball Trapping Gnosian Agathion. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17233.name: Ball Trapping Orodriel Agathion Pack
17233.description: Wrapped pack containing a Ball Trapping Orodriel Agathion. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17234.name: Penalty Kick Agathion Pack
17234.description: Wrapped pack containing a Penalty Kick Agathion. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Cannot use a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17235.name: World Cup Special Gift
17235.description: Special gift in commemoration of the World Cup. Can obtain various items by using it.

17236.name: Gift of Victory Box
17236.description: Gift in commemoration of the World Cup victory. Can obtain Nevit's Hourglass and Voice by using it.

17237.name: Luxury Gift of Victory Box
17237.description: Gift in commemoration of the World Cup victory. Can obtain Nevit's Hourglass and Voice by using it.

17238.name: Olympiad Match 3 Participation Certificate
17238.description: Document that proves participation in the Olympiad Match 3. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive the minimum reward.

17239.name: Olympiad Match 5 Participation Certificate
17239.description: Document that proves participation in the Olympiad Match 5. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive an incomplete reward.

17240.name: Olympiad Match 10 Participation Certificate
17240.description: Document that proves participation in the Olympiad Match 10. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive a whole reward.

17241.name: Olympiad Team Event Certificate
17241.description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad team event 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the class-free and class battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward.

17242.name: Olympiad Class-Free Battle Certificate
17242.description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad class-free battle 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the team event and class battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward.

17243.name: Olympiad Class Battle Certificate
17243.description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad class battle 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the team event and class-free battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward.

17244.name: Olympiad 2 Consecutive Wins Confirmation
17244.description: Document needed to confirm 2 consecutive wins in the Olympiad. Take this confirmation to the Olympiad Operator to receive the minimum reward.

17245.name: Olympiad 5 Consecutive Wins Confirmation
17245.description: Document needed to confirm 5 consecutive wins in the Olympiad. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive an incomplete reward.

17246.name: Olympiad 10 Consecutive Wins Confirmation
17246.description: Document needed to confirm 10 consecutive wins in the Olympiad. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive a whole reward.

17247.name: Party Vitality Herb
17247.description: Herb that brings Vitality to stage 4 for 10 minutes upon use. Effect works for all party members.

17248.name: Large Dragon Bone
17248.description: A summoning item, you can call a raid monster at a certain location in the Dragon Valley. But if the raid monster has already been summoned, it cannot be called.

17249.name: Large Dragon Skull
17249.description: Dragon Skull obtained after finishing off the raid monster that lives in the Dragon Valley. After obtaining the dragon skulls from all 7 different raid monsters, bring them to Gilmore.

17250.name: Large Baby Dragon
17250.description: Baby Dragon obtained after finishing off the raid monster that lives in the Dragon Valley. After obtaining the baby dragon, bring it to the separated soul in the Dragon Valley.

17251.name: Drake Lord's Essence
17251.description: Drake Lord's essence. Bring it to Theodric.

17252.name: Behemoth Leader's Essence
17252.description: Behemoth Leader's Essence. Bring it to Theodric.

17253.name: Dragon Beast's Essence
17253.description: Dragon Beast's Essence. Bring it to Theodric.

17254.name: Box of Theodric
17254.description: Old and tattered box. You can hear a rattling sound when you shake it.

17255.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade) - Event
17255.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 8 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17256.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade) - Event
17256.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17257.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade) - Event
17257.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17258.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade) - Event
17258.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17259.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade) - Event
17259.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17260.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade) - Event
17260.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17261.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade) - Event
17261.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 2 for all D-grade weapons with the exception of bow, which will increase by 4. M. Atk. increases by 2 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17262.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-Grade) - Event
17262.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17263.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade) - Event
17263.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 5 for S-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 10 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17264.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade) - Event
17264.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for S-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

17265.name: Certificate of Dawn
17265.description: A certificate received from the Witness of Dawn Franz. It says that if you show this certificate to Priest Wood, he will exchange it for an occupation specific Forgotten Scroll that can be learned at level 81.

17266.name: Will of Antharas
17266.description: A command stone made by Antharas embedded in his high commanding minions so he will always have control over them. Used to create Antharas Blood Crystal. Bring it to a Separated Soul.

17267.name: Sealed Blood Crystal
17267.description: Small crystal particles made from the blood of Antharas. After his blood was spilt, the land absorbed the blood and acted as a filter that separated the poison from the blood creating a pure form of his blood that crystallized over time. Used to create an Atharas's Blood Crystal. Bring it to a Separated Soul.

17268.name: Antharas Blood Crystal
17268.description: Using the power held within the blood of Antharas, this crystal can revive and fully restore EXP of all dead characters in the Command Channel. Can only be used while inside the Lair of Antharas. Reuse time is 1 hour. Antharas's Blood Crystal

17269.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Antharas
17269.description: Bracelet that summons a cute Antharas Agathion. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17270.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Nevit's Messenger Kanna
17270.description: Bracelet that summons a Nevit's messenger Kanna Agathion. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17271.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Guardian of the Dawn Kallesin
17271.description: Bracelet that summons a Guardian of the Dawn Kallesin Agathion. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

17272.name: Antharas Agathion PAck
17272.description: Special gift that commemorates the conquest of Dragon Valley. When used, you can obtain an Antharas Agathion seal bracelet.

17273.name: Nevit's Messenger Kanna Agathion Pack
17273.description: Special gift that commemorates the completion of the Seven Sign quest. When used, you can obtain a Nevit's Messenger Kanna Agathion seal bracelet.

17274.name: Guardian of the Dawn Kallesin Agathion Pack
17274.description: Special gift that commemorates the completion of the Seven Sign quest. When used, you can obtain a Guardian of the Dawn Kallesin Agathion seal bracelet.

17275.name: Strider Pet Exchange Coupon
17275.description: Certificate that shows receipt of a Strider pet. You can exchange the exchange coupon for the Strider pet through the News Informer. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or put in private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17276.name: 5,000,000 SP scroll
17276.description: Scroll that replenishes 5,000,000 SP. 5,000,000 SP scroll

17277.name: 100,000,000 SP scroll
17277.description: Scroll that replenishes 100,000,000 SP. 5,000,000 SP scroll

17278.name: Strider Pet Exchange Pack
17278.description: Dimensional item pack. Wrapped pack containing a Strider pet exchange coupon. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17279.name: Transformation Scroll: Anakim Pack
17279.description: Gift box containing 1 Anakim Transformation Scroll. When used, you can obtain a Transformation Scroll: Anakim. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed.

17280.name: Transformation Sealbook: Anakim Pack
17280.description: Gift box containing 1 Anakim Transformation Sealbook. When used, you can obtain a Transformation Sealbook: Anakim. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed.

17281.name: Delivery Box
17281.description: Box that Isabel Silvershadow in Hunters Village asks you to deliver. Bring it to Valley Trader Kitzka in Dragon's Valley.

17282.name: 2010 Summer Special Pack
17282.description: Dimensional Item Pack. Gift box containing Nevit's Hourglass, Freya's Refreshing Breeze, and Ice Watermelon Hat. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17283.name: Nevit's Hourglass - 4 hour
17283.description: Dimensional item. Hourglass that increases Nevit's blessing time by 4 hour(s). Can be used regardless of the level. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Dimensional Merchant. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17284.name: Nevit's Hourglass - 4 hour - Event
17284.description: Dimensional item. Hourglass that increases Nevit's blessing time by 4 hour(s). Can be used regardless of the level. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Dimensional Merchant. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17285.name: Freya's Refreshing Breeze
17285.description: Dimensional item. When used, you can feel the Vitality recovery herb's effect for 4 hour(s). But there will be no effect when the "Birthday Joy" effect is applied. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17286.name: Freya's Refreshing Breeze - Event
17286.description: Dimensional item. When used, you can feel the Vitality recovery herb's effect for 4 hour(s). But there will be no effect when the "Birthday Joy" effect is applied. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17287.name: 2010 Summer Special Pack - Event
17287.description: Dimensional Item Pack. Gift box containing Nevit's Hourglass, Freya's Refreshing Breeze, and Ice Watermelon Hat. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17288.name: Ice Watermelon Hat - Event
17288.description: Dimensional item. Hat that looks like a watermelon. Just looking at it is refreshing. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

17289.name: Ice Watermelon Hat
17289.description: Dimensional item. Hat that looks like a watermelon. Just looking at it is refreshing. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.
